body.p: This PI will introduce a list of references. The list may have different forms, see below

tr.td: Allowed values are local(default) and global. If local the list will include references on a module. If global the list will include references encountered so far.
Allowed values are no(default) and yes. If yes the list will be sorted and displayed in a simple list, without refrence to the module who uses the reference.
The number of columns we want. Default value is 1.

body.p: Styleclass describing this PI is: wxtreflist1n, where n is the number of columns specified. See distributed std styles.
